thread.title: Small Boutique Hotel Reasonably Priced
thread.title_full: Small Boutique Hotel Reasonably Priced - Review of Arcadie Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 413serdarg
title: Small Boutique Hotel Reasonably Priced
text: Hotel Arcadie is a small boutique hotel which is reasonably priced and well serviced. There are many restorants around and easy access to public transport. You can reach to 3 different metro stations within a short walking distance. Gare Montparnasse is also only 5 min away by walk. Rooms are small but this is very common in Paris.
